duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide overall Veeva Platform Management to holistically support Veeva across various functional groups including Clinical Research, Marketing, Regulatory, Finance, and Quality.

Lead and complete database build activities for EDC studies and related setup tasks including eCRF/study design, edit check programming, coding setup, external data import setup, and report development.
Participate and lead the training and development of junior staff within the team.

Lead and complete database build activities for EDC studies and related setup tasks including eCRF/study design, edit check programming, coding setup, external data import setup, and report development.
Participate and lead in all compliance audits related to assigned systems.
Adhere to the Company’s Quality Management System (QMS) as well as domestic and global quality system regulations, standards, and procedures.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in engineering, computer science, mathematics or a related field with 8+ years of related experience
